author: @am_azarashi3
text:
0:28〜 えりちゃんが泣いてるところを窓からみんなが見ていて、stay by your side〜♪の右下でみんなが大丈夫だよ〜ってにっこりしたお顔でえりちゃんを抱きしめているのが、本当に本当に愛しくて泣けてくる……。


ニコ動発祥ネタがほとんど分かるくらいの平成オタクなので初見ではそっちに沸き上がったけど、見れば見るほど絵が可愛いし、歌詞も聴けば聴くほどすごく素敵…。落ち込んでる夜更けとか、仕事や学校を終えてお疲れモードの夕暮れ時にエンドレスで聞いて浸っていたい…。2人って言葉が出てくるけど、４人の友愛の曲って言われても違和感ないらいくらい。
可愛いのに本当に優しい曲で大好きです🫶
個人的には元ネタはトラウマもんの怖さなのに思わず抱きしめたくなる「寂しげなムーンライト」がお気に入り🌕

author: @youerasedme
text: aespa won this year's Daesang (Grand Prize), making them the first female artist ever to win the Daesang at The Fact Music Awards. aespa took home a total of three awards this year: aside from the Daesang, the group also won the Listeners' Choice award and an Artist of the Year (Bonsang) award. THE AE IN DAESANG STAND FOR AESPA🙇🏻🔥

author: @youerasedme
text:
nævis will release the first episode of ‘nævis Origin Story’ on August 26th at 6PM KST and will draw the story of the birth of the digital world (Kwangya). 

A total five episodes will be released sequentially until September 5th. The story of aespa’s SMCU worldview, which has been depicted through previous albums and various contents, will be included in ‘nævis Origin Story’, and familiar characters such as ‘ae-aespa’ and ‘Black Mamba’ will also appear.

“nævis Origin Story” is content that contains the highlight points of the upcoming nævis worldview story, and a webtoon depicting the full story will also be launched in the future, allowing you to enjoy the narrative of nævis in a different way.

Episode 2 of ‘nævis Origin Story’ will be released on August 28th at 6PM KST.

author: @Mhwyim
text:
더불어 에스파는 또 다른 타이틀 곡 ‘아마겟돈(Armageddon)’뿐만 아니라 전작 ‘드라마(Drama)’와 ‘스파이시(Spicy)’까지 차트 상위권에 올리며 음원 강자로서의 존재감을 다시 확인했다.
~~
에스파(aespa)의 ‘슈퍼노바(Supernova)’가 주간 차트 11주 연속 1위를 기록했다.

author: @Mhwyim
text: aespa正规1辑主打曲《Supernova》连续11周蝉联Melon、genie周榜冠军，继发行3个月后依然热度不减🔥 此外，另一首主打曲《Armageddon》及前作《Drama》、《Spicy》也进入榜单上位圈，强劲势头备受瞩目。~~~

author: @Mhwyim
text:
#사랑의하츄핑> 개봉까지 D-1

더불어 에스파는 또 다른 타이틀 곡 ‘아마겟돈(Armageddon)’뿐만 아니라 전작 ‘드라마(Drama)’와 ‘스파이시(Spicy)’까지 차트 상위권에 올리며 음원 강자로서의 존재감을 다시 확인했다.

에스파(aespa)의 ‘슈퍼노바(Supernova)’가 주간 차트 11주 연속 1위를 기록했다.

author: @Reiberry-333
text:
Things I noticed:

0:03 - Opanchu-similar or inspired art style, I pretty much only noticed since the art style gave off the vibe of Love Live Ruby Kurosawa's 'Cotton Candy Ei Ei Oh'

0:21 - Japanese mini-game, forgot what it is called but it usually is in gacha games as mini-games, the video is furthered accompanied by these similar Japanese internet culture-themed mini-games

0:56 - Some type of dance rhythm game, again with heavy Japanese influence, reminds me of jpop idol groups with colored lightsticks, specifically animes such as Love Live with colored lightsticks for each member (ex: one member will have green lightsticks when they perform or different fans of each member will have the member's representative color in their lightstick)

0:59 - qwop keyboard running game

1:01 - anime visual novel game

1:15 - Cooking Mama?

1:33 - makeup/dress-up games

1:36 - Ningning in her black cat outfit for Next Level, anime visual novel game again

1:51 - Nothing much but it reminds me of an anime intro
